snippet: A promising new program will shield young immigrants from deportation and free them to seek jobs.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Obama administration's new program to shield young undocumented immigrants from deportation so they can be free to work and go to school; warns, however, that the program is limited and is not a substitute for broad immigration reform; adds that the program is also susceptible to fraud.
lead_paragraph: A promising new program will shield young immigrants from deportation and free them to seek jobs.
